title: BIGO LIVE–Live Stream, Live Chat, Go Live
description: BIGO LIVE allows you to live-stream your favorite moments, make friends from all around the world, and watch 24/7 live stream to kill boredom. We enable people to showcase their talent, discover, and stay connected in a positive, healthy, and creative way. We have over 400 million users around the world. Say no to FOMO, broadcast your life, gain fans, receive gifts, make friends and live in the moment. Or watch live stream, Live video anywhere anytime. BIGO LIVE is a new way to experience life. Why BIGO LIVE? Recommended to people who: - Want to watch live streams and interact with hosts in real-time - Enjoy online music concerts - Like chatting with people from around the world - Enjoy watching gaming live streams and discussing strategies - Are interested in becoming an influencer by showcasing your talents - Like to support others who work hard for their dreams - Love luxury goods GO LIVE Sing? Dance? Have any hidden talents?- You can go live to show off all your talents. Get followers, gain fans, receive gifts, make friends and become an idol to others. WATCH LIVE STREAM We have an active community, and millions of talented broadcasters, dancers, singers, foodies, comedians, and more. People live-stream their interesting life here. LIVE VIDEO CHAT & VIDEO CALL - Invite a friend to start a 1:1 live video chat. - Create a group video chat or live video call with up to 9 people in our Multi-guest Room. - No more boredom. Want to make friends or meet new people? BIGO LIVE can match you with locals around you or with people from all around the globe. - We bring the fun. Check out our video filters and our unique stickers! We have tons of cool filters to choose from. Level it up! LIVE VOICE CHAT & DROP-IN AUDIO CHAT - The space for casual, drop-in audio conversations—with friends and other interesting people around the world, similar to Clubhouse. - Go online anytime to chat with the people, or hop in as a listener and hear what others are talking about. - Make use of our live voice chat with interactive voice emojis to have fun. LIVE PK (LOL) Remember PK? Same. It’s time to dare your friends on BIGO LIVE! - Broadcasters with the most points will win, and losers will be punished. Dare or not? ;) VLOG (Video Blog) Broadcast your life, show off your talents and become a popular vlog star in BIGO LIVE. LIVE GAME STREAMING? YES, WE DO. Go live stream or watch other’s live-streaming popular games, such as PUBG, World of Warcraft, Minecraft, GTA, Fortnite, Dota 2, Hearthstone, Rules of Survival and more. GUIDE TO APP PERMISSIONS - Required Permissions None. - Optional Permissions Location: this is the permission to find broadcasters nearby. Camera and Microphone: this is the permission to go live. Phone: this is the permission to check device status. - How to change permissions? Permissions can be changed in Settings > BIGO LIVE. * Even if you don't agree with the optional permissions, you can use our service except for functions related to those permissions. * If you don't agree with the optional permissions, it may be difficult to use some of our functions properly. SAY HELLO: Instagram: @bigoliveapp / @bigolive.usa Facebook: @bigoliveapp Twitter: @bigoliveapp Instagram: @bigoliveapp YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/bigoliveofficial Your feedback helps us improve BIGO LIVE. Any questions? Please contact us at feedback@bigo.tv
descriptionHTML:
BIGO LIVE allows you to live-stream your favorite moments, make friends from all around the world, and watch 24/7 live stream to kill boredom. We enable people to showcase their talent, discover, and stay connected in a positive, healthy, and creative way.

We have over 400 million users around the world. Say no to FOMO, broadcast your life, gain fans, receive gifts, make friends and live in the moment. Or watch live stream, Live video anywhere anytime. BIGO LIVE is a new way to experience life.

Why BIGO LIVE?

Recommended to people who:
- Want to watch live streams and interact with hosts in real-time
- Enjoy online music concerts
- Like chatting with people from around the world
- Enjoy watching gaming live streams and discussing strategies
- Are interested in becoming an influencer by showcasing your talents
- Like to support others who work hard for their dreams
- Love luxury goods

GO LIVE

Sing? Dance? Have any hidden talents?- You can go live to show off all your talents.
Get followers, gain fans, receive gifts, make friends and become an idol to others.

WATCH LIVE STREAM

We have an active community, and millions of talented broadcasters, dancers, singers, foodies, comedians, and more. People live-stream their interesting life here.

LIVE VIDEO CHAT & VIDEO CALL

- Invite a friend to start a 1:1 live video chat.
- Create a group video chat or live video call with up to 9 people in our Multi-guest Room.
- No more boredom. Want to make friends or meet new people? BIGO LIVE can match you with locals around you or with people from all around the globe.
- We bring the fun. Check out our video filters and our unique stickers! We have tons of cool filters to choose from. Level it up!

LIVE VOICE CHAT & DROP-IN AUDIO CHAT

- The space for casual, drop-in audio conversations—with friends and other interesting people around the world, similar to Clubhouse.
- Go online anytime to chat with the people, or hop in as a listener and hear what others are talking about.
- Make use of our live voice chat with interactive voice emojis to have fun.

LIVE PK (LOL)

Remember PK? Same. It’s time to dare your friends on BIGO LIVE! - Broadcasters with the most points will win, and losers will be punished. Dare or not? ;)

VLOG (Video Blog)

Broadcast your life, show off your talents and become a popular vlog star in BIGO LIVE.

LIVE GAME STREAMING? YES, WE DO.

Go live stream or watch other’s live-streaming popular games, such as PUBG, World of Warcraft, Minecraft, GTA, Fortnite, Dota 2, Hearthstone, Rules of Survival and more.

GUIDE TO APP PERMISSIONS

- Required Permissions
None.

- Optional Permissions
Location: this is the permission to find broadcasters nearby.
Camera and Microphone: this is the permission to go live.
Phone: this is the permission to check device status.

- How to change permissions?
Permissions can be changed in Settings > BIGO LIVE.

* Even if you don't agree with the optional permissions, you can use our service except for functions related to those permissions.
* If you don't agree with the optional permissions, it may be difficult to use some of our functions properly.

SAY HELLO:

Instagram: @bigoliveapp / @bigolive.usa
Facebook: @bigoliveapp
Twitter: @bigoliveapp
Instagram: @bigoliveapp
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/bigoliveofficial

Your feedback helps us improve BIGO LIVE.
Any questions? Please contact us at feedback@bigo.tv
summary: Watch great live stream, or go live to boost social followers, be an influencer!
summaryHTML: Watch great live stream, or go live to boost social followers, be an influencer!
developerAddress: 30 Pasir Panjang Road #15-31A Mapletree Business City, Singapore 117440
recentChanges:
A new room type has been added! Users can now create a Key Room. Only the people being invited or have the key can join the room on BIGO LIVE.
Users can now enjoy a Multi-guest room with up to 12 members. Invite your friends and savor the experience now!
recentChangesHTML:
A new room type has been added! Users can now create a Key Room. Only the people being invited or have the key can join the room on BIGO LIVE.
Users can now enjoy a Multi-guest room with up to 12 members. Invite your friends and savor the experience now!
